actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the use of funds appropriated to the Department of State for United States participation in international fairs and expositions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Supporting U.S. Engagement in Expos Act of 2022

summary.text:
Supporting U.S. Engagement in Expos Act of 2022

This bill authorizes the Department of State to expend funds for U.S. participation in international fairs and expositions abroad, including for construction and operation of U.S. pavilions or other major exhibits.

titles.title: Supporting U.S. Engagement in Expos Act of 2022
